description: Made to pair perfectly with your new ski boots, our Ski Zero Cushion Logo OTC Socks are our thinnest ski socks offered, but still provide the endless comfort of responsibly sourced Merino wool. These men's ski were built with durability and breathability in mind, so you can stay focused on the runs ahead without worry about the quality of your gear.
name: Smartwool Ski Zero Cushion Logo Over The Calf Socks - Mens

specs.value: 55% Merino Wool, 10% Nylon, 31% Recycled Nylon, 4% Elastane
